concept.title: Canvas overview
concept.abstract: Canvas is a web-based learning management system used by learning institutions, educators, and students to access and manage online course learning materials. The University of Minnesota uses Canvas as its primary learning management system.

conbody.p: Canvas includes a variety of customizable tools to help manage and communicate course content. Kaltura integration with Canvas allows users to upload, record, and edit videos that will later be uploaded to the Canvas course page.

Videos in Canvas are often used to share educational content such as
lectures,
demonstrations,
instructions,
weekly overviews.
